uk.co.indigo.play.rfid.print
Class PrintController

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.indigo.play.rfid.print.PrintController

public class PrintController
extends java.lang.Object

Routes print jobs to its defined printer and label type.

milbuw

PrintController

public PrintController(java.lang.String printerName,
                       java.lang.String labelType)
                throws PrintException
Constructs a print controller.

Parameters:
printerName - The name of the printer to use.
labelType - The type of label to use.
Throws:
PrintException - Throw if there are any problems in processing the job.

private java.lang.String acquireTemplate(java.lang.String labelType)
                                  throws PrintException
Loads a template file based on the defined label type.

Parameters:
labelType - The type of label to use.
Returns:
The template.
Throws:
PrintException - Thrown if the template cannot be loaded.

selectPrinter

private Printer selectPrinter(java.lang.String printerName)
                       throws PrintException
Selects a printer based on the defined printer name.

Parameters:
printerName - The name of the printer.
Returns:
A Printer object representing the printer.
Throws:
PrintException - Thrown if no printer can be found.

mergeData

private java.lang.String mergeData(java.lang.String hexTagData,
                                   int quantity)
Merges print data with the template to form a data string that can be sent to the printer.

Parameters:
hexTagData - The data to print. This is the hex sscc tag data.
quantity - How many labels to print.
Returns:
A string containing the merged data.

print

public void print(java.lang.String hexTagData,
                  int quantity)
           throws PrintException
Print the data to the predefined printer and label.

Parameters:
hexTagData - The data to print. This is the hex sscc tag data.
quantity - How many labels to print.
Throws:
PrintException - Thrown if there are any problems from the printer spooler.
